content:
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Sales dashboard
1
Built a reporting suite to track sales performance and help identify gaps in sales 
pipeline on a real-time basis
Original equipment manufacturer (OEM) for electric vehicles

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Picture this…
You’re looking for a comprehensive reporting suite to track sales performance and identify gaps in sales pipeline. Currently, 
you lack real-time visibility into sales team performance it is relied on Excel reports with long turnaround times at a monthly 
cadence.
OEM enterprise needs a cutting-edge sales dashboard
2
Your value is enhanced. 
Your real-time availability of the dashboards saved around 40 man-hours/week to develop reports, and the new discount 
framework helped the team reduce the overall discount offered by 2 percentage points
SALES DASHBOARD
KEY RESULT   
•
40 man-hours/week 
saved
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
Sales cycle time
•
Customer discounting
•
Sales team 
productivity
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to built a reporting suite to track sales performance and help identify gaps in Sales Pipeline on a 
real-time basis, including:
1)
Analyzing Salesforce data and collaborating with the Data Engineering team to help set up data for the reporting suite on 
Snowflake data warehouse
2) Defining KPIs and building self-service reporting suite on Tableau with dashboards that provide real-time visibility into:
•
Actual Order Intake (OI) vs. Budget
•
Ordering Intake Forecast for next 4 months
•
Status of high value opportunities in Sales Pipeline
•
Sales Team Productivity
3) Identifying ~80% of the order intake is entered in Salesforce just 1 week ahead of opportunity closing and suggesting the best 
practices
4) Identifying customers that were offered higher/lower discount compared to the existing guidelines and designing a new 
discounting framework

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Analyzed Salesforce data and collaborated with client’s Data Engineering team to help set up data for the reporting suite on Snowflake data warehouse
•
Defined KPIs and built self-service reporting suite on Tableau with dashboards that provide real-time visibility into:
•
Actual Order Intake (OI) vs. Budget
•
Order Intake Forecast for next 4 months
•
Status of high value opportunities in Sales Pipeline
•
Sales Team Productivity
•
Identified that ~80% of the order intake is entered in Salesforce just 1 week ahead of opportunity closing and suggested the best practices
•
Identified customers that were offered higher/lower discount compared to the existing guidelines and helped the team design a new discounting framework 
Situation
•
Client lacked real-time visibility into Sales Team performance as they relied on Excel reports with long turnaround times and at a monthly cadence
•
Partnered with the client to develop a comprehensive reporting suite to track Sales performance and help identify gaps in sales pipeline
Forecasting AR – collections for a facility services provider 
3
Impact
•
Real-time availability of the dashboards saved around 40 man-hours/week to develop reports
•
The new discount framework helped the team reduce the overall discount offered by 2 percentage points
Sales Dashboard
